text: David William Kearney (September 8, 1934 - April 20, 2022), known as Guitar Shorty, was an American blues guitarist and singer-songwriter. He was known for his guitar style. He was inspired by Jimi Hendrix and Buddy Guy. Guitar Shorty recorded and toured from the 1950s until the 2010s. Guitar Shorty died on April 20, 2022 in Los Angeles, California at the age of 87."In Memoriam: Bluesman David “Guitar Shorty” Kearney", Blues Magazine, April 21, 2022.
